short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The worlds first metal prepaid debit card Enjoy member rewards cash payouts and boost credit score

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZBlackCard is a provider of FDIC-insured Visa® Prepaid, Prepaid MasterCard®, and corporate prepaid card solutions through our issuing banks in the United States. Wit the world turning to a cashless society more people are turning to prepaid debit cards to protect their actual bankcards.

But move over NetSpend, Walmart and RushCard. The ZBlackCard has standards that cant be beat. This luxury metal prepaid debit card is taking the industry by storm. Perfect for online gaming, online shopping, banking, traveling abroad and overseas and so much more. 

Benefits:
No Credit Check
No Transfer Fees
Cash Back
Access Funds At Any Bank
No Monthly Fees
No Point Of Sale Fees
Lowest International Fee
No Customer Service Fees
Mobile App
Member Rewards
No Minimum Balance 
Primary Tradeline to Boost Credit Score

Try ZBlackCard Today!
